GT vs RR Highlights, IPL 2023: Shimron Hetmyer, Sanju Samson Guide Rajasthan Royals To Thrilling Win Over Gujarat Titans | Cricket News
12–15 minutes

[GT vs RR Highlights, IPL 2023: Shimron Hetmyer, Sanju Samson Guide Rajasthan Royals To Thrilling Win Over Gujarat Titans]

GT vs RR Highlights: Rajasthan Royals beat Gujarat Titans by 3 wickets.© BCCI/IPL

Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals Highlights: Shimron Hetmyer and Sanju Samson played sensational knocks as Rajasthan Royals defeated Gujarat Titans by 3 wickets in Ahmedabad on Sunday. Chasing 178, RR found the going tough but Samson's 60 off 32 and Hetmyer's 56 not out off 26 took them through. Earlier, David Miller and Shubman Gill had steered GT to 177 for 7 in 20 overs. While Gill's 45 off 34 provided a good start to GT, Miller's 46 off 30 gave late impetus. Abhinav Manohar also scored quickfire 27. Sandeep Sharma was the pick of the bowlers with figures of 2 for 25. RR skipper Sanju Samson had won the toss and opted to bowl in the game. (Scorecard | IPL Points Table)
Here are Highlights of IPL 2023 match between GT and RR, straight from Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad:

Get alerts for live updates

Turn on notifications to receive alerts as stories develop in real-time. You can manage alerts in your app's settings.

Toggle

    April16202323:11 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: SIX! RR win the game by 3 wickets!

    Shimton Hetmyer took a double on the first ball of Noor Ahmed before slamming a six and finishing the game. RR win the game by 3 wickets and consolidate the top spot in points table.

    RR 179/7 (19.2)

    April16202323:07 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: RR need 7 off 6 balls!

    Rajasthan Royals need 7 runs off the last over.

    April16202323:03 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: SIX and then OUT!

    Dhruv Jurel hit Mohammed Shami for a six and then lost his wicket on the next ball.

    April16202323:00 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: SIX!

    Shimron Hetmyer hit a six to Rashid Khan on the penultimate ball of his last over and then stole a double. 13 runs came off the over and RR need 23 in 12.

    RR 155/5 (18)

    April16202322:58 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: RR need 36 off 18!

    An 8-run over from Noor Ahmed and Rajasthan Royals need 36 runs in 18 balls. This game is nearing an extremely tight finish.

    RR 142/5 (17)

    April16202322:55 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Just saved!

    Shimron Hetmyer has survived a close run out scare. Rajasthan Royals take a sigh of relief. They need 39 runs in 20 balls.

    RR 139/5 (16.4)

    April16202322:50 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: RR need 44 off 24!

    Shimron Hetmyer hits a six on the last ball of Alzarri Joseph's third over. RR need 44 in 24 balls. The game is on!

    RR 134/5 (16)

    April16202322:44 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Sanju Samson is out!

    Sanju Samson falls for 60 off 32 balls. Rajasthan Royals have done well in the last three overs but this wicket will cost them dearly. All to Shimron Hetmyer now.

    RR 114/5 (15)

    April16202322:42 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Fifty for Sanju Samson!

    Sanju Samson raced to his half-century in 29 balls.

    RR 114/5 (15)

    April16202322:38 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Another good over for RR!

    While the 13th over bowled by Rashid Khan gave RR 20 runs, Alzarri Joseph bowled the next over and he too was hit for 15 runs. RR are back in the game. They need 77 runs off 30 balls. The game is on!

    RR 101/4 (14)

    April16202322:35 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Hat-trick sixes from Sanju Samson!

    Sanju Samson has hit hat-trick of sixes to Rashid Khan. This is sensational batting from the RR captain. Taking on Rashid is never easy, but Samson is making it look like a cakewalk.

    April16202322:29 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: RR need 112 runs in 48!

    Another good over from Mohit Sharma and that leaves Rajasthan Royals needing 112 runs off the remaining 48 balls. The required run rate has increased to 14. This is getting tougher for RR.

    RR 66/4 (12)

    April16202322:23 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: SIX!

    A Short ball from Rashid Khan and Sanju Samson has hit it deep into the crowd for a big six. RR need 116 runs 54 balls. 

    RR 62/4 (11)

    April16202322:21 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Rashid Khan on fire!

    Another one bites the dust! Rashid Khan has got better of Riyan Parag. The required run rate was increasing, but RR batters have chosen the wrong bowler to target.

    April16202322:15 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: WICKET!

    First over for Rashid Khan and he broke the partnership of GT for the third wicket. The Afghanistan leggie got the wicket of Devdutt Padikkal on the third ball of his over. 

    RR 50/3 (9)

    April16202322:07 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Mini recovery for RR!

    8 runs come off Hardik Pandya's last over. He ends his quota with figures of 1 for 24. 

    RR 46/2 (8)

    April16202321:58 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Effortless SIX from Sanju Samson!

    It was a 143 km/hr delivery from Alzarri Joseph but Sanju Samson easily pulled it for a six over deep square leg. A total of 12 runs came off the over as Devdutt Padikkal too hit a four in it.

    RR 38/2 (7)

    April16202321:54 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Gujarat Titans dominate powerplay!

    It started with Hardik Pandya claiming the wicket of Yashasvi Jaiswal and then Mohammed Shami cleaned up Jos Buttler. RR never got going in the powerplay and that keeps GT on top.

    RR 26/2 (6)

    April16202321:53 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Another SIX from Padikkal!

    Devdutt Padikkal gets a length ball outside off stump and he hits it over extra cover for a beautiful six.

    RR 26/2 (5.4)

    April16202321:50 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: SIX!

    Easy pickings for Devdutt Padikkal. It was bowled on the pads from Mohammed Shami and the batter nonchalantly flicked it for a six. Shami made a good recovery and produced an outside edge from Padikkal's willow but Shubman Gill dropped the tough chance at first slip.

    RR 20/2 (5)

    April16202321:46 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: FOUR!

    Sanju Samson hits a four towards the backward point region on the bowling of Hardik Pandya. Rajasthan Royals need 165 runs in 96 balls. The required run has gone over 10.

    RR 13/2 (4)

    April16202321:40 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Buttler is out!

    Mohammed Shami has cleaned up Jos Buttler. The batter tried to play a scoop shot but the pace in Shami's delivery undone him. Buttler missed the ball that rattled the stumps. This is a superb start for GT.

    RR 4/2 (2.5)

    April16202321:35 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Jaiswal is gone!

    Hardik Pandya got the wicket of Yashasvi Jaiswal on the third ball of his first over. He conceded only one runs in the over that came on the last ball.

    RR 3/1 (2)

    April16202321:24 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Rajasthan Royals' chase underway!

    Jos Buttler and Yashasvi Jaiswal start the 178-run chase for Rajasthan Royals. Mohammed Shami has the new ball in hand. Here we go!

    It was a good first over from Shami as he conceded only two runs off it.

    April16202321:14 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: GT post 177/7 vs RR!

    Gujarat Titans have posted a good total on the board. Shubman Gill scored 45 while David Miller hit 46. Sandeep Sharma scalped two wickets and conceded only 25 runs in his four overs.

    GT 177/7 (20)

    April16202321:01 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Abhinav Manohar is out!

    Abhinav Manohar has eventually been dismissed by Adam Zampa at the score of 27 runs off 13 balls. GT are still close towards a good total. David Miller will be on strike for the last over.

    GT 166/5 (19)

    April16202321:00 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Abhinav Manohar on fire!

    Abhinav Manohar got one in teh slot and hit it over long-on for a six.

    April16202320:58 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: 17-run over!

    David Miller might not be finding the middle of his bat often, but Abhinav Manohar is on a roll. He is taking the RR bowlers to cleaners. Trent Boult was the victim of his carnage as the pacer leaked 17 runs in his last over.

    GT 154/4 (18)

    April16202320:55 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: SIX! SIX!

    This is a powerful shot from Abhinav Manohar! It seemed that the ball might stop inside but it comfortably cleared the boundary ropes. Okay, here is another from the batter and Trent Boult is feeling the heat now.

    April16202320:52 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: SIX from David Miller!

    David Miller is finally into the act! Yuzvendra Chahal bowled his last over really well but he eventually got hit for a six. Miller walked across the stumps and hit the ball for a biggie.

    GT 137/4 (17)

    April16202320:47 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: RR tighten grip!

    The wicket of Shubman Gill has further increased the problems of GT. RR are in complete control of the game.

    GT 125/4 (16)

    April16202320:42 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: WICKET!

    No fifty for Shubman Gill this time! He has hit a Sandeep Sharma delivery directly into the hands of long-off fielder and departs at the score of 45 off 34 balls. GT go 4 down. 

    GT 121/4 (15.2)

    April16202320:40 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Expensive over!

    12 runs from the third over of Chahal and GT have gained some momentum.

    GT 119/3 (15)

    April16202320:35 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Rajasthan Royals in control!

    Only 19 runs have come off the last four overs. This is a good comeback from RR. They are dominating this game at the moment and one between Gill and Miller needs to charge.

    GT 107/3 (14)

    April16202320:32 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Economical over

    Adam Zampa conceded only two runs in his third over. He has not scalped any wicket so far but has conceded only 20 runs.

    GT 102/3 (13)

    April16202320:29 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: 100 up for GT!

    Gujarat Titans have scored 100 runs in the 12th over. David Miller and Shubman Gill are currently at the crease.

    GT 100/3 (12)

    April16202320:23 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Hardik Pandya is out!

    This is brilliant bowling from Yuzvendra Chahal. He had kept both Hardik and Gill under control with tight bowling and eventually gets his reward. Hardik has lost his wicket while trying to take him on. He departs for 28 off 19 balls. 

    April16202320:17 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: FOUR!

    This was a beautiful pull shot from Hardik Pandya. Trent Boult banged it short and Hardik was quick to hit it through the deep mid-wicket region for a four. 11 runs came off the 10th over and GT are back in command.

    GT 88/2 (10)

    April16202320:14 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: Impressive from Chahal!

    After Rajasthan Royals leaked runs for three consecutive overs, Yuzvendra Chahal bowled a tight one as he conceded only 6 runs. He bowled good line and length to keep both Hardik and Gill under control.

    GT 78/2 (9)

    April16202320:08 (IST)

    GT vs RR LIVE: SIX from Shubman Gill!

    Gill dances down the track again and hits the ball over the bowler's head for a big six. The long-on could only see it sail over the fence for a biggie. 17 runs came of R Ashwin's first over. 

    GT 72/2 (8)

Topics mentioned in this article

4:
news18.com
GT vs RR Highlights, IPL 2023: Sanju Samson, Shimron Hetmyer Fifties Guide Rajasthan Royals to Three-wicket Win
Feroz Khan
12–16 minutes

Apr 16, 2023 23:57 IST
Rajasthan Royals Beat Gujarat Titans For The First Time

Sanju Samson top-scored with 60 while Shimron Hetmyer made an unbeaten 56 off 26 in Rajasthan Royals’ three-wicket win over Gujarat Titans in an IPL 2023 clash on Sunday night in Ahmedabad. Chasing 178, RR slipped to 55/4 at one stage before captain Samson revived their innings with a blistering half-century. Following his dismissal, Hetmyer took charge and with a little help from Ravichandran Ashwin, took RR over the line with four deliveries to spare. For GT, Shami took 3/25 while Rashid Khan took 2/46. GT had lost two wickets early as well but Shubman Gill and Hardik Pandya stitched a superb partnership for the third wicket in a sharp recovery. Plenty of GT batters got the start but none could convert. Gill fell on 45 before David Miller provided the late flourish with an unbeaten 46 to help them finishing with a challenging 177/7. For RR, Sandeep Sharma took 2/25. This was the first time in four attempts that RR have beaten GT.

Apr 16, 2023 23:11 IST
Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals Live: Fifty For Hetmyer And RR Win

Sealed With a SIX! Shirmon Hetmyer doesn’t wait long. He took a couple off the first delivery of the over from Noor Ahmad which also helped him to a 25-ball fifty. And with five needed off five, he goes big with a flat six over midwicket to seal a three-wicket win for RR. Superb innings from Hetmyer – remains unbeaten on 56 off 26.

Apr 16, 2023 23:07 IST
IPL 2023, GT vs RR Live Score: 4,6,OUT!

WICKET! This game continues to swing. Ravichandran Ashwin had done enough to put RR in a comfortable position with a four and six off successive deliveries from Mohammed Shami. And then he opens the face of his bat to offer a dolly to Rahul Tewatia at backward point and cannot believe what he has done. Ashwin out on 10 off 3. RR 171/7 in 18.5 overs, chasing 178.

Apr 16, 2023 23:04 IST
GT vs RR Live Score: OUT! Shami Gets Jurel

WICKET! Rajasthan Royals lose Dhruv Jurel for 18 – a handy cameo. He had just launched a six off Mohammed Shami and then went for the hook shot off a bouncer but Mohit Sharma took a good running catch from fine leg. This game continues to swing from one end to another. RR  161/6 in 18.2 overs, chasing 178.

Apr 16, 2023 23:01 IST
Gujarat vs Rajasthan Live Updates: Hetmyer Continues to Find Boundaries

Shimron Hetmyer pulls one to fine leg for a four after Rashid Khan strays onto the pads. And then misses a big hit before getting the connection off the fifth delivery to send the ball soaring over long-on for a six. A couple off the final makes it 13 runs from the over. RR 155/5 in 18 overs, chasing 178.

Apr 16, 2023 22:58 IST
IPL 2023 Live Cricket Score: Hetmyer Survives a Run Out Attempt

Noor Ahmad continues. Dhruv Jurel goes for a drive square of the wicket and gets an outside edge as Rashid Khan cannot prevent this from touching the boundary. Then later, Jurel tries to steal a leg bye but the Shimron Hetmyer has to hurry a bit. A direct hit and he was gone as replays showed. 8 runs from it. RR 142/5 in 17 overs, chasing 178.

Apr 16, 2023 22:51 IST
Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals Live: Hetmyer Takes Charge With Two Sixes

Having gotten a leading edge away for a six earlier in the over, Shimron Hetmyer launches the final delivery for a six as well – a big drive over long-on. 20 runs from the over. RR  134/5 in 16 overs, chasing 178.

Apr 16, 2023 22:49 IST
IPL 2023, GT vs RR Live Score: Gujarat Review a No-ball

Read more

Buttler early in the chase.

Hardik Pandya landed the first blow in Jaiswal following which Mohammed Shami sent back Buttler for a duck. A fine show from spinners in the middle overs allowed Rajasthan Royals to keep Gujarat Titans batters in check. David Miller top-scored with 46 while Shubman Gill made as GT posted a challenging 177/7 in 20 overs. They lost Wriddhiman Saha and Sai Sudharsan early in the Powerplay before Gill and captain Hardik Pandya stitched a solid partnership to drive the innings.

Sanju Samson, captain of Rajasthan Royals, won the toss and opted to field first against Gujarat Titans. Trent Boult is back for the visitors while GT will be without Vijay Shankar who has been replaced by Abhinav Manohar.

The last year’s finalists will come face to face again in what is expected to be a thrilling affair at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. Gujarat Titans and Rajasthan Royals were clearly the two best teams of the last season and fittingly contested the final as well. However, GT maintained their winning streak against the inaugural champions as they roared to a third straight win over them and in the process became the winners on debut.

The winner of tonight’s clash will also claim the top spot on the points table as well. So far, GT have won three of their four matches for six points. On the other hand, RR have also won three of their four matches so far for six points. The Sanju Samson-led RR are ahead of Hardik Pandya’s GT because of a better net run-rate.

GT bounced back from their first defeat of the season as they completed yet another last-over win over Punjab Kings in Mohali. The contest also saw the return of Pandya into the eleven after he missed the defeat to Kolkata Knight Riders.

RR have been in red-hot form. They started their campaign with a win and a defeat before jotting together two wins in a row including against struggling Delhi Capitals and a tough Chennai Super Kings.

RR though have a fitness concern. Their star pacer Trent Boult missed the CSK game due to a what was described as a ‘small niggle’.  They will be hoping their strike bowler to make a full recovery. GT have no injury concern.

RR’s success this season has been built on the form of their openers – Yashasvi Jaiswal and Jos Buttler. These two have helped them set high scores which the bowlers have backed themselves to defend. Additionally, their spinners – Ravichandran Ashwin and Yuzvendra Chahal – have been in fine form as well.

Get the latest Cricket News, IPL 2023 Live Score, Orange Cap and Purple Cap holder details here

news18.com
GT vs RR Highlights, IPL 2023: Sanju Samson, Shimron Hetmyer Fifties Guide Rajasthan Royals to Three-wicket Win
Feroz Khan
12–16 minutes

Apr 16, 2023 23:57 IST
Rajasthan Royals Beat Gujarat Titans For The First Time

Sanju Samson top-scored with 60 while Shimron Hetmyer made an unbeaten 56 off 26 in Rajasthan Royals’ three-wicket win over Gujarat Titans in an IPL 2023 clash on Sunday night in Ahmedabad. Chasing 178, RR slipped to 55/4 at one stage before captain Samson revived their innings with a blistering half-century. Following his dismissal, Hetmyer took charge and with a little help from Ravichandran Ashwin, took RR over the line with four deliveries to spare. For GT, Shami took 3/25 while Rashid Khan took 2/46. GT had lost two wickets early as well but Shubman Gill and Hardik Pandya stitched a superb partnership for the third wicket in a sharp recovery. Plenty of GT batters got the start but none could convert. Gill fell on 45 before David Miller provided the late flourish with an unbeaten 46 to help them finishing with a challenging 177/7. For RR, Sandeep Sharma took 2/25. This was the first time in four attempts that RR have beaten GT.

Apr 16, 2023 23:11 IST
Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals Live: Fifty For Hetmyer And RR Win

Sealed With a SIX! Shirmon Hetmyer doesn’t wait long. He took a couple off the first delivery of the over from Noor Ahmad which also helped him to a 25-ball fifty. And with five needed off five, he goes big with a flat six over midwicket to seal a three-wicket win for RR. Superb innings from Hetmyer – remains unbeaten on 56 off 26.

9:
sportskeeda.com
Gujarat Titans vs Rajasthan Royals
Sportskeeda Desk
2–3 minutes

Rajasthan Royals won by 3 wickets

Gujarat Titans 177/7 in 20 overs

David Miller 46(30) | Shubman Gill 45(34)
Sandeep Sharma 2/25(4) | Adam Zampa 1/32(4)

Rajasthan Royals 179/7 in 19.2 overs

Sanju Samson 60(32) | Shimron Hetmyer 56*(26)
Mohammed Shami 3/25(4) | Rashid Khan 2/46(4)

That is one heck of an innings from Shimron Hetmyer. Along with Sanju Samson, the duo has won them the game from a hopeless situation. This also proves the importance of Hetmyer as the finisher in this Rajasthan team. He has lived up to the expectations so far and the Royals finally get one past the Titans. They lost all their three games against GT in the previous edition but they have gone one better already in 2023. A great game yet again and the Titans will need to ponder on their bowling towards the end. 

The Rajasthan Royals got off to the worst possible start, losing their two openers Yashasvi Jaiswal and Jos Buttler inside the 3rd over. It was incredible new ball bowling from Mohammed Shami and Hardik Pandya and put them on the backfoot straightaway. From there on, it was Devdutt Padikkal and Sanju Samson who tried to steady the ship. The stylish left-hander played some delightful shots before perishing to Rashid Khan. 

Riyan Parag's struggles continued as he fell for yet another low score but Samson found an able ally in Shimron Hetmyer who looked in complete command of proceedings right from the word go. Samson was hitting them big and smashed Rashid Khan for a hat-trick of sixes. He was eventually dismissed by the impact sub Noor Ahmad but he had provided a platform for the likes of Hetmyer and Jurel to seal the deal. 

 Dhruv Jurel then came out with a positive frame of mind and scored a quickfire 18 off 10 deliveries. Ravichandran Ashwin almost sealed it for them with a four and a six of the penultimate over but the drama continued as he was dismissed very next ball. Noor Ahmad was handed over the ball for the final over and Hetmyer smashed him for a six over deep midwicket to win it for the Royals.
